attribs.name: marquee
attribs.current:
It wasn't Tremere who unlocked the secrets of vampiric immortality, but his disciple Goratrix.  His methods were barbaric: he
experimented on hundreds of native Tzimisce, ultimately starting a war between Clan Tzimisce and the newly-formed Clan Tremere.
Though the Omen War has long ended, the hatred between the two clans persists undimmed into the modern nights.

attribs.name: bp_slaketext
attribs.current:
Animals & bagged blood slake half Hunger.
Humans slake full Hunger.
Must kill to reduce Hunger below 1.

attribs.name: bane_text
attribs.current: Your Tremere Blood lacks the power to Blood Bond other Kindred (though you can still be Bound by Kindred from other clans).  You can still bind mortals and ghouls, though the corrupted vitae must be drunk an additional number of times equal to your Bane Severity (1) for the bond to form.

attribs.name: repeating_others_-LN71q0nGmEaY3gqsN4w_kr_otherdetails
attribs.current: The sire of Arthur Roy, Jim embraced Arthur partly because of their mutual interest in the ancient Hermetic Order, partly because Jim was lonely on the UoT as the only Tremere who still worked there. Two years ago, Jim was slain for violating Camarilla law - which law was not stated.

attribs.name: repeating_beliefs_-LN8T7pccu9AMOq8ny61_conviction
attribs.current: Respect must be Earned, or its Worthless

attribs.name: repeating_merits_-LN8WOw2qfRTKumYw-H0_merit_details
attribs.current: I never officially died, therefore normalcy is confirmed.

attribs.name: repeating_merits_-LN8ch16ZSf6RxhNzQSC_merit_details
attribs.current: With the recent destruction of the Pyramid, I have followed Carna's teachings in breaking the chains.

attribs.name: xp_summary
attribs.current: 32 XP Earned - 20 XP Spent =  12 XP Remaining

attribs.name: repeating_earnedxp_-LOL0MvPwNaxCZiyOYUV_xp_reason
attribs.current: Initial XP awarded at the beginning of the Chronicle.

attribs.name: repeating_advantage_-LON5q4A2ZryJzNKDhUG_advantage_details
attribs.current: The baroness values your coterie quite highly, but her support is unreliable: The duties of her office demand much of her time, not to mention how difficult it can be to contact her given her frequent relocations and security precautions.

attribs.name: repeating_negadvantage_-LON6-xKUhvtZAQJov5N_negadvantage_details
attribs.current: Frederik Scheer, elder of Clan Tremere and Camarilla seneschal of Toronto, has not ceded any part of his city to the Anarchs.  The erosion of Camarilla power has only intensified his fervor: Toronto will remain the Camarilla stronghold it always has been, whatever it takes.  Unfortunately for you, his attentions are firmly fixed on your coterie --- not only are you the baroness' most prized with two of her childer among its members, but your recent activities have proven to be a thorn in Scheer's side one too many times.

attribs.name: domain_personal
attribs.current: University of Toronto - Hall of History, Humanities, & Philosophy.

attribs.name: domain_coterie
attribs.current: Regrettably, Dr. Roy must occasionally step into the seedy fight club ran by King. In the age of smart phone cameras, Dr. Roy uses the back entrance to enter and exit, so as not to be potentially seen by students punching it out over there.

attribs.name: domain_haven
attribs.current: Dr. Roy rents an apartment room in Yorkville, closes the curtains, and tries to avoid hearing the neighbors enjoy each other. It's quiet, decent, and as unassuming as Rudolf Abel's abode in Hell's Kitchen.

attribs.name: domain_hunt
attribs.current: Often, some students can't keep up with Dr. Roy's curriculum. But he is a benevolent teacher, and will happily schedule a one-on-one tutoring session with the student in his office. The student walks away feeling light-headed, but with a very comprehensive knowledge on the subject that was discussed.

attribs.name: assets_carried
attribs.current: Wallet, key ring, and older flip-phone.

attribs.name: assets_vehicles
attribs.current: Dr. Roy owns a 2014 Chevy Equinox, which he uses to drive to his night-job at the university.

attribs.name: assets_stashed
attribs.current:
Roughly $200,000 in Canadian dollars are within Dr. Roy's bank account. Those would be his un-life savings.
Aside from that, the back of the fight club usually has materials ready for things like crafting blood stones, as well as a space for Dr. Roy to prepare Scorpion's Touch.

attribs.name: ambition
attribs.current:
Dr. Roy simply wants one thing from the Anarchs. Revenge. Revenge for his sire. The Seneschal must die. After this, Dr. Roy will try to preserve as much knowledge and history as he can before the fires of Anarch revolution. 

Dr. Roy will also look into acquiring a forbidden text that even the Anarchs do not tolerate. The Book of the Grave-War. He will see to it that he will not be a bond-slave, as well as reaping other benefits from having and possessing the knowledge within this dark and forbidden text.

attribs.name: mortal_history
attribs.current: Always fascinated with history, Arthur Roy pursued knowledge of what was to a fault. Born to a typical family in Halifax, Arthur Roy was an exceptional pupil and was granted a scholarship to study at the University of Toronto. Graduating cum laude and studying to become a teacher in the esteemed university. Often, the faculty would enjoy high-brow parties - where Arthur Roy would occupy a corner and regale his fellow professors with historical knowledge rarely discussed on account of how obscure it was. This earned the attention of chemistry professor Jim Watkins, when he once told Watkins some obscure facts on the Hermetic Society - the same which Tremere was once a member of. The two bonded over such histories, and by 2008, Watkins had received approval from his Tremere regent to make Arthur Roy - now working on his dissertation - to become Watkins' childer. Roy was brought up to speed, given some time to think it over, and agreed to see if he could preserve history himself and keep it from getting lost. Also, he mind was awash with thoughts on elder vampires and the stories they could tell - but Roy was told he'd have to work to even get an audience with the elders. The 18th of March, 2008 was when Roy breathed his last, and drank his first.

attribs.name: mortal_ambition
attribs.current: Roy wishes to make sure his students walk away from his course knowing history and context, and to make sure they view the distant past as less distant.

attribs.name: repeating_earnedxp_-LQi-2PXEH1IYiI9W5qZ_xp_reason
attribs.current: Three Troubled Thin-Bloods: Story completion award.

attribs.name: repeating_project_-LRdfgb84XQBgWFw1uBe_projectgoal
attribs.current: Make contact with other members of House Carna

attribs.name: repeating_boonsowed_-LSCdU1JqOF3d7OWZONE_boonowed_details
attribs.current: Anita has provided a wealth of necessary information, therefore Roy owes her a great deal.

attribs.name: repeating_earnedxp_-LSk2BP82DTT6lT1j6Dk_xp_reason
attribs.current: Session XP award (albeit smaller, given the short session).
